questions.question: The roots of the equation H(z) must occur in ________________
What is the value of h(M-1/2) if the unit sample response is anti-symmetric?
What is the number of filter coefficients that specify the frequency response for h(n) symmetric?

answers.a: (M-1)/2 when M is even and M/2 when M is odd
answers.b: (M-1)/2 when M is odd and M/2 when M is even
answers.c: (M+1)/2 when M is even and M/2 when M is odd
answers.d: (M+1)/2 when M is odd and M/2 when M is even

questions.question: What is the number of filter coefficients that specify the frequency response for h(n) anti-symmetric?

answers.a: (M-1)/2 when M is even and M/2 when M is odd
answers.b: (M-1)/2 when M is odd and M/2 when M is even
answers.c: (M+1)/2 when M is even and M/2 when M is odd
answers.d: (M+1)/2 when M is odd and M/2 when M is even
